content: marigold is the week 17 square for the 2016 friends around the world cal this easy 12 inch afghan block features a 2d center flower that bursts almost out of the square the online version of the pattern includes quick-glance photo-diagrams designed to make the crochet experience smooth and fun seasoned crocheters will find they can hook right along without referencing the written pattern as often newer crocheters will find the diagrams helpful to use along with the pattern printable pdfs are also available in all 10 languages but do not contain the many photos from the online pattern a printable color placement planning sheet is also included for those who like experiment with color visit me polly plum and stay up to date on new patterns by checking out my website 1 everytrickonthehook com for things like tutorials and free patterns liking every trick on the hook on facebook 2 following polly_plum_crochet on instagram 3 or visiting polly s place on ravelry 4 you can see all of my patterns on my designer page on ravelry 5 1 everytrickonthehook com 2 https //www facebook com/everytrickonthehook/ 3 https //www instagram com/polly_plum_crochet/ 4 http //www ravelry com/groups/pollys-place 5 http //www ravelry com/designers/polly-plum
